### Ingest the data
#### date, location, magnitude, and impact


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/earthquakes/significant-earthquakes-around-the-world.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
head(df, n=10)

```


### Base map
#### natural earth


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-show'}

ne_world <- ne_countries(scale = "small", returnclass = "sf")
ne_world <- filter(ne_world, iso_a3 != "ATA")

```


### Wrangle
#### enrich base map with top 10 deadliest


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source = 'fold-hide'}

df_worst <- df %>% slice_max(x_of_deaths, n = 10)
df_worst$ISO3C <- countrycode(df_worst$location, origin = "country.name", destination = "iso3c")
df_worst

df_worst_merge <- df_worst %>% select(ISO3C, x_of_deaths)

ne_world_worst <- merge(ne_world, df_worst_merge, by.x = "iso_a3", by.y = "ISO3C", all = TRUE)
ne_world_worst <- ne_world_worst %>% dplyr::mutate(x_of_deaths = replace_na(x_of_deaths, 0))

```


### View
#### with country highlights, points, and annotations


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source='fold-hide', fig.align='center', out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  text = element_text(family = "inconsolata"), 
  plot.title = element_text(color = "black", size = 14, face = "bold", family = "inconsolata"),
  plot.subtitle = element_text(color = "black", size = 12, family = "inconsolata"),
  plot.caption = element_text(color = "#555555", size = 8, family = "inconsolata"),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
  panel.grid = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  axis.text = element_blank(),
  axis.line = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks = element_blank(),
  axis.title = element_blank(),
  legend.position = "none",
  legend.title = element_blank()
)

v1 <- ggplot(data = ne_world_worst) +
  geom_sf(aes(fill=x_of_deaths), color="#000000", stroke=0.5) +
  geom_point( data = df, aes(x=longitude, y=latitude, color=magnitude), size=1.5, alpha = 0.8) +
  geom_point( data = df_worst, aes(x=longitude, y=latitude, size=x_of_deaths), shape = 21, color = "black", fill = NA, stroke = 1.5, alpha = 1.0) +
  geom_label_repel(data = df_worst, aes(x = longitude, y = latitude, label = paste0(location, ", ", locality, "\n", year, ", ", magnitude,  ", ", round(x_of_deaths/1000, digits = 0), "k")), 
                  size = 4, hjust = 0.5, vjust = 0.5, nudge_y = -10, family = "inconsolata", fontface = "bold",
                  seed = 42, force = 25, force_pull = 0, box.padding = 0.75, min.segment.length = 0, direction = "both", 
                  segment.color = "black", segment.size = 1.5, segment.curvature = -0.1, segment.ncp = 3, segment.angle = 20, color = "white", fill = "#D32F2F", alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_color_gradient(low = "#FFCDD2", high = "#C62828", na.value = NA) +
  scale_fill_gradient(low = "#f0f0f0", high = "#888888", na.value = NA) +
  scale_size_continuous(range = c(4, 20), guide = "none") +
  labs(x=NULL,
       y=NULL,
       title = "Deadliest Earthquakes", 
       subtitle=NULL) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 16, height_svg = 7,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0)))

```
